name: no step
description:
Avoid stepping on the tiny creatures! Look at how cute they are, trying to get home. Be sure to get out of their way by jumping. You only get 5 mistakes!

This is my first complete (meaning from title screen to game over. might add more features later) game. It might be tiny, but it feels nice to have finished something.

Made during the STOP WAITING FOR GODOT jam.

Enjoy!!

Commands: arrow keys

Creatures sprites and fonts: https://kenney.nl/assets
